title: Vilexistent - Into The Light EP [2013][320kbps]
description:
==================================================================================

This EP is a tribute to one of my major sources of inspiration for composing music, and that is the hip-hop producer, Nujabes. Sadly, he passed away in a car accident on February 26th, 2010, which was a huge loss for the hip-hop community, but the music he left behind still continues to inspire thousands, and this release is the prime result of that. 

Regarding my approach towards this EP, I decided to implement his jazzy/chill style into the songs, with a little bit of me fused into them. I hope you enjoy this!

==================================================================================

TRACK LIST:

1. Vilexistent - The Influence (3:45)
2. Vilexistent - Bliss (3:13)
3. Vilexistent - The Void (3:46)
4. Vilexistent - Drifting (4:15)

==================================================================================

Thank you for reading, and stay connected for future releases!

==================================================================================
